name: test_e2e_with_logs[030_SQLI_BYPASS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_001` |
| **Name** | MySQL version comment WAF bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/*!50000 UNION*/ /*!50000 SELECT*/ version(),NULL,NULL --`
- **Encoded**: `%21*50000%20UNION*%2F%20%21*50000%20SELECT*%2F%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~40000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:54:39.000 UTC
